com.accela.mobile

Class AMRequestSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.accela.mobile.AMRequestSender

  • public class AMRequestSender
extends java.lang.Object
    AccelaMobile http request class, use to send all different types of http methods and documents list download/upload.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • sendRequest

        public AMRequest sendRequest(java.lang.String path,
                             com.accela.mobile.http.RequestParams urlParams,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customHttpHeader,
                             AMRequestDelegate requestDelegate)
        Makes a request to the Accela Construct API endpoint with the given parameters using the given HTTP method as an asynchronous operation. This request transfer method is default for Get.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the Accela Construct API endpoint.
        urlParams - The collection of parameters associated with the specific URL.
        customHttpHeader - The HTTP header fields in key value pairs.
        requestDelegate - The request's delegate or null if it doesn't have a delegate. See AMRequestDelegate for more information.
        Returns:
        The AMRequest object corresponding to this Accela Construct API endpoint call.
        Since:
        4.1

      • sendRequest

        public AMRequest sendRequest(java.lang.String path,
                             com.accela.mobile.http.RequestParams urlParams,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customHttpHeader,
                             AMRequest.HTTPMethod httpMethod,
                             com.accela.mobile.http.RequestParams postData,
                             AMRequestDelegate requestDelegate)
        Makes a request to the Accela Construct API endpoint with the given parameters using the given HTTP method as an asynchronous operation.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the Accela Construct API endpoint.
        urlParams - The collection of parameters associated with the specific URL.
        customHttpHeader - The HTTP header fields in key value pairs.
        httpMethod - The HTTP data transfer method (such as GET, POST, PUT or DELETE).
        postData - The content sent with the corresponding request(only used in POST or PUT method).
        requestDelegate - The request's delegate or null if it doesn't have a delegate. See AMRequestDelegate for more information.
        Returns:
        The AMRequest object corresponding to this Accela Construct API endpoint call.
        Since:
        4.1

      • sendRequest

        public AMRequest sendRequest(AMBatchSession batchSession,
                             java.lang.String path,
                             com.accela.mobile.http.RequestParams urlParams,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customHttpHeader,
                             AMRequestDelegate requestDelegate)
        Makes a batch request to the Accela Construct API endpoint with the given parameters using the given HTTP method as an asynchronous operation.
        Parameters:
        batchSession - This contains the list of request which going to make
        path - The path to the Accela Construct API endpoint.
        urlParams - The collection of parameters associated with the specific URL.
        customHttpHeader - The HTTP header fields in key value pairs.
        requestDelegate - The request's delegate or null if it doesn't have a delegate. See AMRequestDelegate for more information.
        Returns:
        Since:
        4.0

      • sendRequest

        public AMRequest sendRequest(AMBatchSession batchSession,
                             java.lang.String path,
                             com.accela.mobile.http.RequestParams urlParams,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customHttpHeader,
                             AMRequest.HTTPMethod httpMethod,
                             com.accela.mobile.http.RequestParams postData,
                             AMRequestDelegate requestDelegate)
        Makes a request to the Accela Construct API end point with the given parameters using the given HTTP method as an asynchronous operation.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the Accela Construct API end point.
        urlParams - The collection of parameters associated with the specific URL.
        customHttpHeader - The HTTP header fields in key value pairs.
        httpMethod - The HTTP data transfer method (such as GET, POST, PUT or DELETE).
        postData - The content sent with the corresponding request(only used in POST or PUT method).
        requestDelegate - The request's delegate or null if it doesn't have a delegate. See AMRequestDelegate for more information.
        Returns:
        The AMRequest object corresponding to this Accela Construct API end point call.
        Since:
        4.1

      • loadImage

        public AMRequest loadImage(java.lang.String path,
                           com.accela.mobile.http.RequestParams urlParams,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customHttpHeader,
                           AMRequestDelegate requestDelegate,
                           int maxWidth,
                           int maxHeight,
                           ImageView.ScaleType scaleType)
        Download a resized image to a cache. See AMLruCache. This is suitable to download small images which may need cache for reuse, for example: thumbnails on a list view.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the Accela Construct API end point.
        urlParams - The collection of parameters associated with the specific URL.
        customHttpHeader - The HTTP header fields in key value pairs.
        requestDelegate - The request's delegate or null if it doesn't have a delegate. See AMRequestDelegate for more information.
        maxWidth - The maximum width of the returned image
        maxHeight - The maximum height of the returned image
        scaleType - The ScaleType of the image returned for display in a imageView.
        Returns:
        The AMRequest object corresponding to this Accela Construct API end point call.
        Since:
        4.1

      • loadImage

        public AMRequest loadImage(java.lang.String path,
                           com.accela.mobile.http.RequestParams urlParams,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customHttpHeader,
                           AMRequestDelegate requestDelegate,
                           int maxWidth,
                           int maxHeight)
        Download a resized image to a cache. See AMLruCache. This is suitable to download small images which may need cache for reuse, for example: thumbnails on a list view.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the Accela Construct API end point.
        urlParams - The collection of parameters associated with the specific URL.
        customHttpHeader - The HTTP header fields in key value pairs.
        requestDelegate - The request's delegate or null if it doesn't have a delegate. See AMRequestDelegate for more information.
        maxWidth - The maximum width of the returned image
        maxHeight - The maximum height of the returned image
        Returns:
        The AMRequest object corresponding to this Accela Construct API end point call.
        Since:
        4.1

      • loadImage

        public AMRequest loadImage(java.lang.String path,
                           com.accela.mobile.http.RequestParams urlParams,
                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customHttpHeader,
                           AMRequestDelegate requestDelegate)
        Download a resized image to a cache. See AMLruCache. This is suitable to download small images which may need cache for reuse, for example: thumbnails on a list view.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the Accela Construct API end point.
        urlParams - The collection of parameters associated with the specific URL.
        customHttpHeader - The HTTP header fields in key value pairs.
        requestDelegate - The request's delegate or null if it doesn't have a delegate. See AMRequestDelegate for more information.
        Returns:
        The AMRequest object corresponding to this Accela Construct API end point call.
        Since:
        4.1

      • uploadAttachments

        public AMRequest uploadAttachments(java.lang.String path,
                                   com.accela.mobile.http.RequestParams urlParams,
                                   com.accela.mobile.http.RequestParams postParams,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> fileInformation,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customHttpHeader,
                                   AMRequestDelegate requestDelegate)
        Uploads a set of binary files as an asynchronous operation.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the Accela Construct API endpoint.
        fileInformation - The file collection of key-value pairs. Note the key name is "fileName", and the value is file's full path.
        customHttpHeader - The HTTP header fields in key value pairs.
        requestDelegate - The request's delegate or null if it doesn't have a delegate. See AMRequestDelegate for more information.
        Returns:
        The AMRequest object corresponding to this Accela Construct API endpoint call.
        Since:
        1.0

      • downloadAttachment

        public AMRequest downloadAttachment(java.lang.String path,
                                    com.accela.mobile.http.RequestParams urlParams,
                                    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> customHttpHeader,
                                    java.lang.String localFile,
                                    com.accela.mobile.http.AMDocDownloadRequest.AMDownloadDelegate downloadDelegate)
        Download a set of binary files to local disk
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the Accela Construct API endpoint.
        urlParams - The collection of parameters associated with the specific URL.
        localFile - The path for file.
        Returns:
        The AMRequest object corresponding to this Accela Construct API endpoint call.
        Since:
        4.1
